title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8 §§ 145-9.2 - Definitions
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8 §§ 145-9.2 - Definitions

State Regulations

As used in this Subpart: (a) High school shall mean a nonpublic or
public high school which is authorized to issue high school diplomas in
accordance with the requirements of section
100.2
of this Title. (b) Approved substitute assessment shall mean
an assessment which is offered by a high school as a substitute for a Regents
examination and is approved through a variance granted by the department, pursuant to the requirements of section
100.2
(f) of this

Title or approved by the department pursuant to section
100.5
(d)(4)
of
this Title. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8
§§
145-9.2

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
